tweet:
What's wrong with the name #Jehangir. 
Even the great Dr Homi Jehangir Bhabha, father of Indian Nuclear Programme had Jehangir in his name. 
Also, what a couple name their child is no one's business. 
We are becoming an Islamophobic nation.
